channel.title: Primes on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Primes on Warframe Blog

item.title: How To Get Rhino Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Rhino Prime along with Ankyros Prime and Boltor Prime have emerged from the Prime Vault. Today I'll be showing you which relics you'll need to farm to get Rhino Prime and where you can farm these relics.

item.description: Hey guys. And the Ankyros Prime along with Rhino Prime and Boltor Prime have emerged from the Prime Vault. Today I'll be showing you which relics you'll need to farm to get Ankyros Prime and where you can farm these relics.

item.title: How To Get Loki Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Loki Prime along with Bo Prime and Wyrm Prime have been retired(vaulted) from the Warframe reward tables.
